snippet.title: N₂O: Nitrous Oxide - PlayStation Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1998 for the Sony Playstation, N₂O took players on a high-speed journey through a bizzare and challenging tubular world, all while listening to a pumping big beat soundtrack by The Crystal Method.

30 psychedelic levels of adrenaline-pumping action. Fight a constant stream of terrifying insectoid aliens trying to stop you in your tracks. Choose from up to four kinds of spacecraft, and customize their look.

Features a 2-player local coop mode (second player will need their own game controller) either on one screen or split-screen.

Compete in a series of dangerous races. Use your prize money to upgrade your car, adding everything from a turbocharger to missiles!

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release from Pixel Games UK.
N₂O: Nitrous Oxide (C) Urbanscan

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2200560/N2O/

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #playstation #ps1 #psx #psone #gremlin #gremlininteractive #urbanscan #n20 #nitrousoxide #thecrystalmethod

FUN FACT: This game was re-released on Steam twice. In 2015, a company called "Console Classics" released their own version of the emulated Steam port. While the now-delisted 2015 port (which was sold for $5, by the way!) was a rare example of a PS1 emulation coming with official support for achievements, as well as being the only PS1 emulation as a whole to have Steam Trading Cards, Pixel Games UK's port seems to have better configuration options, smoother and more responsive controls, smoother video and the music seems to cleaner and has better quality.
